system.description:
Effect: All valid targets are @Affliction[grounded] 5.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Normal-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: Max Strike
